item.title: Daily Rundown 04/25/2021
item.description: Photo from Pixabay I finally started digging into my backlog of articles to research, which mostly consists of a bunch of Google Chrome tabs. Below are some interesting reads: Things to consider if you want to launch a crypto token Creating a smart contract from another smart contract Wrapped BAN? It’s coming! CryptomonKeys collectible NFTs via Alien Worlds [reddit] Why should your business accept $NANO Easy Amazon EC2 Instance Comparison TickerRain does sentiment analysis related to stocks on reddit Freqtrade, open source crypto trading bot The Coin Perspective, if other tokens had Bitcoin’s market cap Learn Docker the easy way Priceless: The Myth of Fair Value Multi-signature in NANO Send cryptographically secure messages via NANO blocks The Blockchain Trilemma The Great Crypto Heist
item.content:
Photo from Pixabay

I finally started digging into my backlog of articles to research, which mostly consists of a bunch of Google Chrome tabs. Below are some interesting reads:

  • Things to consider if you want to launch a crypto token
  • Creating a smart contract from another smart contract
  • Wrapped BAN? It’s coming!
  • CryptomonKeys collectible NFTs via Alien Worlds [reddit]
  • Why should your business accept $NANO
  • Easy Amazon EC2 Instance Comparison
  • TickerRain does sentiment analysis related to stocks on reddit
  • Freqtrade, open source crypto trading bot
  • The Coin Perspective, if other tokens had Bitcoin’s market cap
  • Learn Docker the easy way
  • Priceless: The Myth of Fair Value
  • Multi-signature in NANO
  • Send cryptographically secure messages via NANO blocks
  • The Blockchain Trilemma
  • The Great Crypto Heist
